title: Jiminy's Is Fighting Climate Change One Pet Treat At A Time - Forbes
body: Jiminy's Chewy Cricket Treat. Jiminy's 2022. Carlson tells the story of Lauren, a millennial Jiminy's customer who refers to her dog Mordecai as "her son."

title: Don't Like Eating Insects? Your Pet Might.
body: Insects and lab-made animal protein have the potential to be far less damaging to the environment. And because pets tend to eat the same thing every day, changing their food "can have real impact," Ms. Carlson said. "It's like flipping a switch. One day it's unsustainable, the next, it's sustainable."
